recipesJson.name: Coil killa!
recipesJson.author: Highjinx
recipesJson.description: After 3 to 4 day steep this is a great strawberry marshmallow . After about 5-6 days it’s pretty close to strawberry fluff. I don’t know if you’ve ever had it? But I love it as a kid. I could eat it right out of the jar. This is a great tasteing recipe. Only draw back the OOO vanilla marshmallow will kill your coils. You have been warned. Lol.
